title: 急求被假人卡服务器
author: suzixuan520
txt_content: 服务器被不一样IP的假人进服务器！然后服务器卡死

replies.author: suzixuan520
replies.txt_content: 你们看不一样的IP！封不完

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
